entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.4°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 49 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
